thread.title: Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend is beaten up near safe house | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend is beaten up near safe house | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Wallis Simons
title: Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend is beaten up near safe house | Daily Mail Online
text: Karen Matthews' paedophile former boyfriend Craig Meehan is beaten up close to his 'secret safe house' by three men who discovered his identity Craig Matthews was with Karen Matthews for five years before she was jailed Meehan, 30, was himself jailed for possessing images showing child sex abuse Three men attacked him outside a Tesco store after discovering his real identity 'He was just getting used to coming out again,' his friend revealed to MailOnline His former partner faked the kidnap of her daughter Shannon for reward money Meehan's girlfriend Matthews and uncle Michael Donovan were jailed over plot BBC drama The Moorside has renewed interest around the harrowing abduction Published: 11:35 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 11:53 GMT, 14 February 2017 22 shares
